original_title: Alerta Roja: 30 años de aburrimiento nacional
overview: Alert Roja is one of the pioneer groups of the Punk movement in Argentina in the early 80's, along with Los Violadores, Los Laxantes and Los Baraja. This short documentary records a show by the band on their return to the stage, as well as talking a bit about their extensive career in the underground.
title: Alerta Roja: 30 años de aburrimiento nacional
